# time

**Instance Property**

The hour and minute at which the alarm alerts, relative to the device’s current timezone.

## Declaration

```swift
var time: Alarm.Schedule.Relative.Time
```

## Describing an alarm

- **repeats**: The cadence at which the alarm repeats, if any.
- **Alarm.Schedule.Relative.Recurrence**: Describes the cadence at which an alarm will repeat, if any.
